description: Areyto means "community gathering" in the Taino Indian language, and you'll find this name to be perfectly suiting, as you gather 'round with fellow foodies for the incredibly delicious dishes from Denver's first authentic Puerto Rican food truck. They are serving up a tasty selection of Jibaritos (plantain sandwiches filled with your choice of meat, onions, cheese, salad and guava or spicy mayo sauce), scrumptious Gouda Cheese Balls, marvelously juicy Meat skewers, and more.Make your way to Areyto for traditional island cuisine that delightfully unites the Mile High City.
name: Areyto
